column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: skill. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/example#> .# Class definitionsex:Skill rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:SoftSkill rdf:type rdfs:Class ;            rdfs:subClassOf ex:Skill .ex:HardSkill rdf:type rdfs:Class ;             rdfs:subClassOf ex:Skill .ex:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class .# Property definitionsex:hasSkill rdf:type rdf:Property ;            rdfs:domain ex:Person ;            rdfs:range ex:Skill .# Individual definitionsex:Communication rdf:type ex:SoftSkill .ex:Coding rdf:type ex:HardSkill .ex:JohnDoe rdf:type ex:Person ;           ex:hasSkill ex:Coding .# Annotation for entitiesex:Skill rdfs:comment "A person's expertise or capability in a specific area." .ex:SoftSkill rdfs:comment "A type of skill that deals with personal attributes and interpersonal abilities." .ex:HardSkill rdfs:comment "A type of skill that deals with specific technical abilities and knowledge." .ex:hasSkill rdfs:comment "Represents the ownership of a skill by a person." .ex:Communication rdfs:comment "A type of soft skill that involves expressing thoughts and ideas effectively." .ex:Coding rdfs:comment "A type of hard skill that involves programming computers and creating software." .ex:JohnDoe rdfs:comment "An example individual who has coding as a skill." .```
